One fan in response to the tweet wrote: "If a show that contains Baelor, Blackwater, the Red Wedding, the Viper vs. the Mountain, the Battle against Mance, Shireen Baratheon, Hardhome, Battle of the Bastards and Cersei's trial is suddenly being described with the words 's--- gets REAL' then there is not enough toilet paper on earth to contain the amount of s--- borne of tension that I will produce in this interim."
